name: CUSTOM ATC Button #2
liquid_code:
<style>

  .ss-atc-button-style {
    font-size: {{section.settings.ss-font_size}}px;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
    border-radius: {{section.settings.ss-border_radius}}px;
    background: linear-gradient(-45deg, {{ section.settings.first_color }}, {{ section.settings.second_color }}, {{ section.settings.third_color }}, {{ section.settings.fourth_color }});
    background-size: 600%;
    animation: anime 8s linear infinite;
  }
  .ss-atc-button-style::after {
    --border-opacity: none;
  }

   .ss-atc-button-style:hover {
     border: 1px solid black;
   }
 @keyframes anime {
   0% {
     background-position: 0% 50%;
   }
   50% {
     background-position: 100% 50%;
   }
   100%{
      background-position: 0% 50%;
   }
  }
  
</style>

<script>
    window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', (event) => {
        const productForm = document.querySelector('{% if section.settings.custom_class_selector != blank %}{{ section.settings.custom_class_selector }}{% else %}.product-form__submit, .add-to-cart, .product-form__cart-submit, .button--addToCart, .product-buy-buttons--cta, .product__submit__add{% endif %}')

        if (!productForm) {
            return
        }
      
      productForm.classList.add("ss-atc-button-style");
    });
</script>
